comments.content:
I think we're looking at [Bryant](http://web.archive.org/web/20130203073730/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=PRC.123364.3.6&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=THE+DRAMA&sampleSize=48).

- Lex

Good one Lex. Those aren't the easiest letters to use for ID's and they were small besides, but I think you got it.

- Mike Yanega
